TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RolePrincipal extends System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class RolePrincipal Inherits ClaimsPrincipal Implements ISerializable
type RolePrincipal = class inherit ClaimsPrincipal interface ISerializable

summary.span: Represents security information for the current HTTP request, including role membership.

span.span: Represents security information for the current HTTP request, including role membership.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象实现接口，并在表示 HTTP 请求的当前安全上下文。The object implements the interface and represents the current security context for the HTTP request. 启用角色管理后 (请参阅)，则分配对象传递给属性 。When role management is enabled (see ), the assigns a object to the property of the . 类公开为当前 HTTP 请求的安全标识和另外的角色成员身份进行检查。The class exposes the security identity for the current HTTP request and additionally performs checks for role membership. 如果是`true`，则对象管理的角色的缓存的列表和查找中已缓存的当前用户的角色成员身份列表前，然后角色。If is `true`, then the object manages the cached list of roles and looks up role membership for the current user in the cached list first, then the role . 如果是`false`、对象始终查找使用角色提供程序的角色成员身份。If is `false`, the object always looks up role membership using the role provider. 对象进行加密和解密在由标识的 cookie 中缓存的角色信息基于。The object encrypts and decrypts role information cached in the cookie identified by the based on the .

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载构造函数创建一个新对象并初始化它的属性值。This overload of the constructor creates a new object and initializes its property values. 从由标识的 cookie 不读取缓存的角色信息属性。Cached role information is not read from the cookie identified by the property. 属性设置为的默认角色提供程序。The property is set to the of the default role provider. 有关启用角色管理的信息，请参阅类。For information on enabling role management, see the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新对象。The following code example creates a new object. 如果是`true`，该示例创建与从由标识 cookie 的 cookie 信息属性。If is `true`, the example creates the with cookie information from the cookie identified by the property. span.span: if the list of role names cached with the object has been modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将返回`true`角色名称检索从默认角色后和添加到缓存中，按方法，或当方法调用方法默认角色提供程序，然后接收的响应`true`，这会导致角色名称传递给中方法添加到缓存。The property will return `true` after role names have been retrieved from the default role and added to the cache by the method, or when the method calls the method of the default role provider and then receives a response of `true`, resulting in the role name passed to the method being added to the cache. 属性将还返回 true，如果设置为`true`和已传递，从而在新设置。The property will also return true if is set to `true` and the has passed, resulting in a new being set. ## Examples 如果启用角色管理，下面的示例将显示角色缓存当前用户的信息。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 有关启用角色管理的信息，请参阅类。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]

The default is /.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的值`cookiePath`从 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的属性。The property returns the value of the `cookiePath` attribute from the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 有关 cookie 路径的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on cookie paths, see . ## Examples 如果启用角色管理，下面的示例将显示角色缓存当前用户的信息。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 有关启用角色管理的信息，请参阅类。For information on enabling role management, see the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`和表示的用户为已缓存角色名称，则方法将返回用户所在的缓存的角色名称的列表。If is `true` and role names have been cached for the user represented by the , then the method will return the list of role names in the cache that the user is a member of. 如果尚未缓存角色名称，则方法将返回用户是从默认角色的成员的角色名称的列表。If role names have not been cached, then the method returns the list of role names that the user is a member of from the default role . 仅为当前的角色名称返回。Only role names for the current are returned. 若要确定是否已在缓存角色名称对象，检查属性。To determine whether role names have been cached in the object, check the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示所属角色的成员的登录的用户。The following code example displays the roles that the logged-on user is a member of. returns.span: if user represented by the is in the specified role; otherwise, .

span.span: if user represented by the is in the specified role; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先检查属性来确定是否可缓存当前用户的角色名称的列表。 first checks the property to determine whether a cached list of role names for the current user is available. 如果属性是`true`，为指定的角色会检查缓存的列表。If the property is `true`, the cached list is checked for the specified role. 如果方法在缓存的列表中找到指定的角色，它将返回`true`。If the method finds the specified role in the cached list, it returns `true`. 如果找不到指定的角色，它调用方法的默认值实例以确定用户名称是从数据源中为配置的角色相关联值。If does not find the specified role, it calls the method of the default instance to determine whether the user name is associated with a role from the data source for the configured value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查以确定登录的用户是否管理员角色允许用户查看用户角色之前。The following code example checks to see whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view user roles. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/ViewRolescs.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/ViewRolesvb.aspx#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsRoleListCached As Boolean
public: property bool IsRoleListCached { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether the list of roles for the user has been cached in a cookie.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the list of roles for the user has been cached in a cookie.

value.span: 如果在某个 cookie; 缓存角色名称，否则为。

span.span: if role names are cached in a cookie; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`cacheRolesInCookie`属性在 Web.config 文件中的应用设置为`true`，则为当前用户的角色名称的列表写入 cookie 时检查特定角色中的用户成员身份。If the `cacheRolesInCookie` attribute in the Web.config file for the application is set to `true`, then a list of role names for the current user is written to a cookie when user membership in a particular role is checked. 属性指示角色名称是否已写入到 cookie。The property indicates whether role names have been written to the cookie. 请注意，即使`cacheRolesInCookie`配置属性可能为`true`、属性不返回`true`直到角色信息已写入到 cookie 后。Note that, even though the `cacheRolesInCookie` configuration attribute may be `true`, the property does not return `true` until after role information has been written to the cookie. 如果没有相应的角色检查执行对于用户，将返回`false`。If no role checks are performed for a user, will return `false`. ## Examples 如果启用角色管理，下面的示例将显示角色缓存当前用户的信息。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 有关启用角色管理的信息，请参阅类。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProviderName As String
public: property System::String ^ ProviderName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.

span.span: Gets the name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.

value.span: 用于存储和检索用户的角色信息的角色提供程序名称。

span.span: The name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性公开管理所表示的用户角色信息的角色提供程序的名称对象。The property exposes the name of the role provider that manages the role information for the user represented by the object. 这使你可以通过访问用户的特定的角色提供程序实例属性，无论是否提供程序的默认提供程序应用程序的类。This enables you to access the specific role-provider instance for a user by using the property of the class regardless of whether the provider is the default provider for the application. 例如，你可能创建一个带方法作为输入，并返回所表示的用户角色的列表。For example, you may create a method that takes a as input and returns the list of roles for the represented user. 你可以确保相应的角色提供程序用于返回角色列表通过调用方法中的角色提供程序按编制索引的集合属性值。You can ensure that the appropriate role provider is used to return the list of roles for the by calling the method of the role provider from the collection that is indexed by the property value. 若要填充对象为每个请求必须使用在应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中定义的事件处理程序。To populate the object for each request, you must use a event handler defined in the Global.asax file for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值方法存储在角色 cookie 时是`true`。The value returned by the method is stored in the roles cookie when is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将的结果角色 cookie 的方法。The following code example writes the results of the method to the roles cookie. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/snippetscs.aspx#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/snippetsvb.aspx#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets the version number of the roles cookie.

span.span: Gets the version number of the roles cookie.

value.span: 角色 cookie 的版本号。

span.span: The version number of the roles cookie.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 的未来版本可以通过在角色 cookie 中包含的版本号，修改角色 cookie 的格式并使用属性来区分不同的格式。By including a version number in the roles cookie, future releases of ASP.NET can modify the format of the roles cookie and use the property to distinguish between different formats. ## Examples 如果启用角色管理，下面的示例将显示角色缓存当前用户的信息。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 有关启用角色管理的信息，请参阅类。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]
